snippet.title: Sea Salt - Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/983350/Sea_Salt/
Follow Sea Salt on Twitter - https://twitter.com/YCJYgames

Sea Salt is a reverse action strategy hybrid game where you take control of a monster swarm. With a hive-mind command over your army of minions, that are summoned using unlockable tarot cards, you will rage through the landscape in search of the high bishop killing anyone in your path.

New official trailer: https://youtu.be/Gw4sSbOO7s4

We had a successful kickstarter campaign about a year ago and have been working hard to expanding the game and polishing and really making it into something people will hopefully find special. 

Release in Spring of 2019

Made in Gamemaker
